roleset.name: study very hard
roleset.note: RESEARCH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'research' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. Comparison with 'study' (from research.01-v predicate notes)
RESEARCH-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry research.01 and OntoNotes sense grouping research.01; no mapping to VN. Framed by Claire (from research.01-n)

example.name: basic transitive
example.text: Johnnie Johnson, who worked for Mr. Corry in strategic planning, recalls how his boss would routinely ask [a subordinate]-1 *trace*-1 to research an entire industry to target acquisition candidates.

example.name: NP only
example.text: federal research on the effectiveness of medical treatments
example.arg: on the effectiveness of medical treatments

example.name: Subject only
example.text: Market research shows that viewers prefer blondes.

example.name: Extent only
example.text: Extensive research provides no indication that bromine has any nutritional use.

example.name: Args 0 and 1
example.text: Hugo Spiers discusses his research into London taxi drivers and their navigational abilities.
example.arg: into London taxi drivers and their navigational abilities
